How to Keep Your Terminal Connected and from Being Automatically Disconnected by the Remote Computer - 2007-06-19 10:42:52-04  
      Do you want to stay connected via your terminal to a remote computer, even when you're idle?  Whether you are on a Windows, Mac, or Linux machine, don't you just hate it when you are connected to a remote system via ssh, and you do something in another window, only to find when you return to your ssh session that you've been automatically disconnected by the remote system, and you have to log in all over again?  Here's how make it so that you can stay connected to the remote computer with ssh no matter how long you are idle.
